original_text:
for the price of a prostitute is only a loaf of bread,
    but a married woman hunts down a precious life.
korean_text: 음녀로 말미암아 사람이 한 조각 떡만 남게 됨이며 음란한 여인은 귀한 생명을 사냥함이니라

sentences.original_text: for the price of a prostitute is only a loaf of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 창녀의 값은 빵 한 조각일 뿐이다

sentences.original_text: but a married woman hunts down a precious life.
